A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi was great\, like Luke said it's not going to go the way you want it. Kylo is growing\, Rey is discovering herself\, Luke redeemed his failure & Leia shows strength never before seen. It's not to long\, I didn't feel the 2hrs. I got to see it again\, the sacrifice Laura dern does is awesome big thumb and a hell yea to last Jedi!
